summary: Adds Aragorn as a Potential Follower
descriptionHtml:
Working on the Uruk Hai Wars, I decided to add a hero, and the hero is Aragorn.
He is strongly enough to aid you in [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28522/] The Uruk Hai Wars[/url]
---
Requirements: 
Dawnguard DLC
Skyrim last update
---

-Where did you find him ? He is at Rorikstead Inn, waiting for you.
-Stats ? You\'ll find him at lvl 20. He will raise in lvl with you till 81.
-Abilities? Fearsome warrior, skilled at all kinds of warrior type stuff.

*Credits to burninheaven for givin me the chance to use his custom Aragorn armor :) 
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6497]Aragorn Ranger Armor[/url]
*Credits to Bethesda for making the best game ever
*Credits to Nexus Site for having such a strong build comminuty

*Report me any issues
author: Scotaiel
